留言內容: I gotta tell you about this super cool Hawaiian shirt I got from COOFANDY! It's like the best thing ever for summer vibes. First of all, the size was totally perfect! I was worried it might be too big or small, but it fit just right. The shirt is short-sleeved, so it's perfect for when it's hot outside.But the best part is the design. It's all covered in these awesome floral prints. It's like having a mini tropical vacation on my shirt! And guess what? It even has a pocket. I can stash my sunglasses or maybe some cool seashells I find at the beach. How rad is that?The fabric feels nice and soft, so it's comfy to wear. I can run around and play without feeling all sweaty and gross. Plus, it's super easy to button up and down. I can dress it up for a summer party or just wear it to chill out with my friends.Overall, I'm totally happy with this COOFANDY Hawaiian shirt. Great for summer style!

留言內容: We ordered a large and the shirt fit as expected and looks great on my guy.  He's 6' 180 approx. with a little belly.  The shirt hangs really nice on him. The fabric is not totally wrinkle free after washing and drying.  It scrunched up a little at the collar, pocket flaps where the fabric was doubled.  I was able to smooth them out a little after the dryer.  In the future,  I could smooth them out after the wash and hang to dry on a hanger. We love the shirt.  The colors are vibrant.  I have ordered another shirt  from this vendor, the fabric is a little silkier without being like silk but it washes up beautifully.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷熱帶襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣花卉夏季海灘襯衫附口袋

留言內容: My title says it, the shirt material is very nice, and is wrinkle-free as far as I’m concerned, however, there is one thing you must know before buying one. Really think through your shirt size first. I read that you should buy one the next size up, make that two sizes up. I have lost enough weight to go from a size 3X to a 1X now. So I bought a 2X thinking it ought to be fine. Well it’s almost skin-tight on me and certainly is not a 2X. I’ve been a 2X on my weight loss journey so I know the size. Other than I need to lose another 10 pounds to feel comfortable wearing the shirt, I’m still looking forward to wearing it.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷熱帶襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣花卉夏季海灘襯衫附口袋
SKU: 顏色: 黑色向日葵尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: My only real complaint, and this is a common complaint for me in most short sleeve shirts. The sleeves are too short. Maybe it's because I'm somewhat of a tall guy. I generally try to stay away from short sleeves, I'd rather have long sleeves and roll them up. The sleeves of a short sleeve button down shirt should be 1-2 inches longer and wider than your basic under shirt t-shirt. If you're using this strictly as a beach shirt it's fine. I still think the sleeves are too short for an XL though. XL should mean a small increase in length along with circumference.Everything else size wise is on par with most brands.
